name: toArray
title: .toArray()
desc: Retrieve all the DOM elements contained in the jQuery set, as an array.

examples.desc: Selects all divs in the document and returns the DOM Elements as an Array, then uses the built-in reverse-method to reverse that array.

entries.longdesc:
.toArray() returns all of the elements in the jQuery set:

alert($('li').toArray());

All of the matched DOM nodes are returned by this call, contained in a standard array:

[<li id="foo">, <li id="bar">]
